cn.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

Privacy Policy: 
https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

Terms of Use: 
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

cn.description:
《无处遁形：全网公敌》是Steam平台广受好评的剧情向黑客解密游戏《全网公敌》手游版本。玩家通过网络搜索和社工手段获取目标人物信息，其隐藏最深的秘密都无处遁形。游戏中的每个故事看似各自独立，但随着剧情的发展却是草蛇灰线，伏脉千里。当所有事件串联起来，竟隐藏着惊天的秘密……

希望玩家在游玩的同时，对网络本身也能产生反思，学会保护好个人隐私。

【游戏内容】
◆第一章：程序员之死
某公司CEO跳楼自杀，自称被毒妻勒索千万；而妻子却在社交网络上发布被家暴的照片。谣言满天，谁在说谎？
◆第二章：看不见的眼睛
女大学生的不雅视频在网络疯传，这一刻，她已然社会性死亡。到底谁才是始作俑者？女性的安全又该由谁去保护？
◆第三章：消失的证据
品学兼优的学生会长忽然失踪。霸凌事件使案情越发扑朔迷离。谁是凶手，谁是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代价
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！恐吓信、炒作、前女团成员自杀事件……网络再掀舆论狂欢！
◆第五章：永生代码
当社会陷入癫狂，你是否也愿意加入永生代码，获得真正的爱与永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一个看似甜蜜而美满的家庭背后，每个人都有各自的秘密，隐藏在背后的真相到底是什么？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一场离奇的车祸，让泰坦公司的高级研究员Lucrezia Borgia博士当场死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死里逃生，但他却没有意识到自己即将卷入一场巨大的阴谋之中……

【游戏特点】
◆代入感强：在虚构的世界里，玩家扮演一名黑客，接受一家公司委托，完成一个个不同的社工事件，体验真实的黑客操作。
◆玩法多样：游戏内有多个系统，除了社工系统，还会有推理、追踪、解谜，破坏侵入等系统需要玩家们去一一攻破。
◆剧情复杂：游戏中你将面临大量的选择和谜题，而不同的选择可能将导致不同的结局。
◆人物众多：登场人物众多，每个人物都有自己的性格特点，而他们背后都有着不为人知的故事，需要作为黑客的你去一一发现事件的真相。
◆全程配音：游戏中所有出现的角色都有真人配音，让整个游戏的体验和代入感更加强烈。
◆原创音乐：多首原创主题曲以及各种音乐音效，搭配精彩剧情，享受震撼体验。

【核心功能】
◆网络搜索：玩家通过浏览器搜索功能收集目标对象的基础信息。
◆数据库：利用已知信息输入到数据库中，通过筛选后或许目标对象的其他信息。
◆破解：通过获得的目标人物信息来生成密码，用于登陆各平台的账户（包括邮箱、社交平台、聊天软件等）。
◆伪装：获取目标对象的需求、社交圈等，根据信息选择伪装，通过和目标对象接触获取更多信息。
◆聊天沟通：添加目标对象为好友后，进行聊天沟通获取信息。
◆图片分析：从图片中获取有价值的信息内容及相关线索。
当然，后期还会解锁更多的高阶社工方法！

为将您的体验提升到全新水平，我们带来了三项令人惊叹的新功能：

cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！
主要功能亮点：
• 锁屏播放：在后台持续收听您视频的音频。
• 浮动播放（画中画）：在观看视频时使用其他应用。
• 睡眠定时器：设置自动关闭，安心放松。
• 循环模式：无限循环播放您喜欢的视频。
此外还包括：
• 可切换字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 质量选择和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，实时建议（预测搜索）
• 上传日期筛选：按天、周、月或年
FyTube非常适合不想错过任何喜欢主题视频的用户。
尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。
如何激活？
只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。
点击播放——音频将持续不断。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！
启用此功能，视频会自动重复播放任意次数。
怎么知道它是否开启？
激活时图标会变红。
（支持VoiceOver：会提示开启或关闭状态。）
非常适合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜欢反复播放的内容！

需要帮助使用这些功能？访问：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 简单易用的界面，友好设计
• 随时快进或倒退——不错过精彩部分
• 启用字幕
• 根据喜好调整播放速度
• 更改视频质量
• 智能搜索，实时建议和上传日期筛选：天、周、月、年、全部
• 每个视频包含相关视频区，发现更多有趣内容
• 发现最新视频，保持资讯更新
• 应用直接连接YouTube，让您找到任何视频
• 支持任何兼容AirPlay的设备播放
• 支持VoiceOver（增强描述）
• 无需账户
• 未经您允许，不存储缓存、Cookie或个人数据——安全观看
• 界面支持29种语言
• 无广告，无订阅
购买FyTube一次付费，开启无广告无订阅的新流媒体体验。

最低要求：
• iOS 13或更高版本
• 3G及以上网络连接

youtube，youtube音乐，youtube vanced，YouTube广告拦截器，无订阅，跳过YouTube广告，无广告音乐，无广告，YouTube应用，YouTube广告屏蔽，拦截弹窗，移除广告，屏蔽广告，广告拦截，内容屏蔽，无广告，无广告浏览器，拦截广告，跳过广告，无广告音乐，无广告YouTube，无广告视频等。

cn.description:
感谢您使用FocusDots！这是一个简单的时间管理应用，将提高您的工作效率。

有时候，保持注意力集中在任务上可能并不容易。FocusDots是一个精美设计的计时器，旨在提高您对任务的专注，并丢弃可能分散注意力的活动。

FocusDots是一个简单的时间管理应用，包含四个简单的步骤：

1) 决定要完成的单个任务。
2) 启动FocusDots并在计时器结束前（25分钟）专注于该任务。
3) 休息一下（5分钟）。
4) 完成四个Dots后，休息更长时间（15分钟）。

特点：
- 优雅的极简设计
- 每日总结
- 精美设计主题
- 激励引用语
- 可为您的任务自定义计时器时长

感谢您选择FocusDots！我们由衷感谢您的支持，希望我们的应用能帮助您提高生产力和时间管理技巧。如果您有任何反馈或建议，我们非常乐意听取！

cn.releaseNotes:
Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
cn.description:
梁的挠度是一个功能强大且多功能的计算器，适用于梁、二维桁架和二维框架。界面简洁直观，图形输出采用最先进技术。除了反力、剪切、弯矩和挠度结果外，梁的挠度还能计算横截面和梁沿线的内部剪切和弯曲应力。

二维框架和桁架编辑器

二维编辑器与梁编辑器无缝集成。绘制任意框架和桁架结构，并使用与梁相同的简单界面应用载荷和约束。您可以直接在二维编辑器中可视化结果，或选择一个梁以获取更多见解。

内部应力

获取内部弯曲和剪切应力图，除了剪切、弯矩和挠度图。可以沿着梁的长度以及横截面的垂直轴线可视化内部应力。

横截面编辑器

编辑内置的横截面。惯性矩和面积值会自动计算并应用到其余的梁计算中。

更多功能

• 内置数据库包含更多数据供您参考和方便使用。
• 可选应用梁自重
• 无限设计文件
• 快速启动模板

联系我们

我们期待您的反馈！如果您有任何问题、疑问或评论，请发送电子邮件至contact@ketchep.com。

你陷入進了無限延伸的地下通道。請仔細觀察四周，到達“8號出口”吧。




請不要放過任何異變的蛛絲馬跡。

若發現異變，請立刻原路返回。

若未發現異變，則不要返回。

請從8號出口離開。




《8號出口》是一款以日本的地下通道、閾限空間、後室等等為靈感的短篇步行模擬遊戲。

◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

hk.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：

FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！

怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。

非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

hk.description:
感謝您使用FocusDots！這是一個簡單的時間管理應用，將提高您的工作效率。

有時候，保持注意力集中在任務上可能並不容易。FocusDots是一個精美設計的計時器，旨在提高您對任務的專注，並丟棄可能分散注意力的活動。

FocusDots是一個簡單的時間管理應用，包含四個簡單的步驟：

1) 決定要完成的單個任務。
2) 啟動FocusDots並在計時器結束前（25分鐘）專注於該任務。
3) 休息一下（5分鐘）。
4) 完成四個Dots後，休息更長時間（15分鐘）。

特點：
- 優雅的極簡設計
- 每日總結
- 精美設計主題
- 激勵引用語
- 可為您的任務自定義計時器時長

感謝您選擇FocusDots！我們由衷感謝您的支持，希望我們的應用能幫助您提高生產力和時間管理技巧。如果您有任何反饋或建議，我們非常樂意聽取！

hk.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

hk.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
hk.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

hk.releaseNotes:
Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
hk.description:
樑的撓度是一款功能強大且多功能的計算器，適用於梁、二維桁架和二維框架。介面簡單直觀，圖形輸出採用最先進技術。除了反應力、剪力、彎矩和撓度結果之外，樑的撓度還能計算梁截面和梁長度上的內部剪力和彎曲應力。

二維框架和桁架編輯器

二維編輯器與梁編輯器無縫整合。繪製任意框架和桁架結構，並使用與梁相同的簡單介面來應用荷載和約束。您可以直接在二維編輯器中視覺化結果，或選擇一個梁以獲得更多洞見。

內部應力

除了剪力、彎矩和撓度圖之外，還可以獲得內部彎曲應力和剪力的圖表。可以沿著梁的長度以及截面的垂直軸線可視化內部應力。

截面編輯器

編輯內置截面。轉動慣量和面積值會自動計算並應用於其餘的梁計算。

更多功能

• 內置數據庫包含更多參考數據，方便使用。
• 可選擇應用梁自重
• 無限設計文件
• 快速開始模板

聯繫

如有任何問題或評論，請發送電子郵件至contact@ketchep.com。

mo.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

mo.trackName: ATracker PRO - 每日時間管理
mo.releaseNotes: - 各種錯誤修復及小幅改進
mo.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。
 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取
 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新
 -  您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費
 -  您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新
 -  您無法在已付費期間內取消購買
 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效

APP支援
訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系
服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html
隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html

mo.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。

• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕

FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。

非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

mo.description:
感謝您使用FocusDots！這是一個簡單的時間管理應用，將提高您的工作效率。

有時候，保持注意力集中在任務上可能並不容易。FocusDots是一個精美設計的計時器，旨在提高您對任務的專注，並丟棄可能分散注意力的活動。

FocusDots是一個簡單的時間管理應用，包含四個簡單的步驟：

1) 決定要完成的單個任務。
2) 啟動FocusDots並在計時器結束前（25分鐘）專注於該任務。
3) 休息一下（5分鐘）。
4) 完成四個Dots後，休息更長時間（15分鐘）。

特點：
- 優雅的極簡設計
- 每日總結
- 精美設計主題
- 激勵引用語
- 可為您的任務自定義計時器時長

感謝您選擇FocusDots！我們由衷感謝您的支持，希望我們的應用能幫助您提高生產力和時間管理技巧。如果您有任何反饋或建議，我們非常樂意聽取！

mo.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

mo.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
mo.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

mo.releaseNotes:
Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
mo.description:
樑的撓度是一款功能強大且多功能的計算器，適用於梁、二維桁架和二維框架。介面簡單直觀，圖形輸出採用最先進技術。除了反應力、剪力、彎矩和撓度結果之外，樑的撓度還能計算梁截面和梁長度上的內部剪力和彎曲應力。

二維框架和桁架編輯器

二維編輯器與梁編輯器無縫整合。繪製任意框架和桁架結構，並使用與梁相同的簡單介面來應用荷載和約束。您可以直接在二維編輯器中視覺化結果，或選擇一個梁以獲得更多洞見。

內部應力

除了剪力、彎矩和撓度圖之外，還可以獲得內部彎曲應力和剪力的圖表。可以沿著梁的長度以及截面的垂直軸線可視化內部應力。

截面編輯器

編輯內置截面。轉動慣量和面積值會自動計算並應用於其餘的梁計算。

更多功能

• 內置數據庫包含更多參考數據，方便使用。
• 可選擇應用梁自重
• 無限設計文件
• 快速開始模板

聯繫

如有任何問題或評論，請發送電子郵件至contact@ketchep.com。

tw.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

tw.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

https://okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

tw.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計

tw.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
tw.description:
樑的撓度是一款功能強大且多功能的計算器，適用於梁、二維桁架和二維框架。介面簡單直觀，圖形輸出採用最先進技術。除了反應力、剪力、彎矩和撓度結果之外，樑的撓度還能計算梁截面和梁長度上的內部剪力和彎曲應力。

二維框架和桁架編輯器

二維編輯器與梁編輯器無縫整合。繪製任意框架和桁架結構，並使用與梁相同的簡單介面來應用荷載和約束。您可以直接在二維編輯器中視覺化結果，或選擇一個梁以獲得更多洞見。

內部應力

除了剪力、彎矩和撓度圖之外，還可以獲得內部彎曲應力和剪力的圖表。可以沿著梁的長度以及截面的垂直軸線可視化內部應力。

截面編輯器

編輯內置截面。轉動慣量和面積值會自動計算並應用於其餘的梁計算。

更多功能

• 內置數據庫包含更多參考數據，方便使用。
• 可選擇應用梁自重
• 無限設計文件
• 快速開始模板

聯繫

如有任何問題或評論，請發送電子郵件至contact@ketchep.com。

FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

us.description:
A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

Features
- Elegant minimalist design
- Daily Summary
- Beautiful crafted design themes
- Quotes to inspire and motivate you
- Custom timer duration for your tasks


Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:

- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

us.description:
Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. 

Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging.

The Demon King's Castle in Ruins
The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before.
What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. 
They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'.

Dark Mirror Mode
Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode!

FEATURES
-You’re the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon.  
-Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies.
-What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer.
-Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state.
-From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover… Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game?

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFi controllers
- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

us.description:
Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming.

As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming – all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games.

 - Play through the history of action-adventure video games
 - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action
 - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship!
 - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect

Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com
Follow us on Twitter @playdigious
Like us on Facebook /playdigious

If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using.

Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

us.releaseNotes:
Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
us.description:
Deflection is a powerful, versatile calculator for beams, 2D trusses, and 2D frames.  The interface is simple and intuitive, and the graphical output is state-of-the-art.  In addition to reaction, shear, bending moment, and deflection results, Deflection also computes internal shear and bending stress along the cross section and along the beam.

2D FRAME AND TRUSS EDITOR

The 2D editor is seamlessly integrated with the beam editor.  Draw arbitrary frame and truss structures and apply loads and constraints using the same simple interface as for beams.  You can visualize results directly within the 2D editor, or you can select a beam and get additional insights. 

INTERNAL STRESSES

Obtain internal bending and shear stress diagrams in addition to shear, bending, and deflection diagrams.  The internal stresses can be visualized along the length of the beam as well as along the vertical axis of the cross section using the beam editor.

CROSS SECTION EDITOR

Edit built-in cross sections.  Moment of inertia and area values are automatically calculated and applied to the rest of the beam calculations.

MORE FEATURES

• The built-in database contains more data for your reference and convenience.
• Apply beam self-weight optionally
• Unlimited design files
• Quick-start templates

CONTACT

We like to hear from you!  Please email contact@ketchep.com if you have any issues, questions, or comments.

us.description:
Videdit has more than 30 features: Info, Trim, Crop, Blend, Erase, Chromakey, Mosaic, Splice, Particle, BlingBling, Filter, Text, Sticker, Paint, Tuner, Dub, Speed, Reverse, Zoom, Rotate, Compress, Gif, Collage, Magnifier, Distortion, Reflection ...

With Videdit, you can edit your videos in a lot of ways and make them more awesome and different.

=== SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE === 
Choose the video from Photo, Select a way of editing, handle it and save or share it.

=== RICH FEATURES === 
+ View, modify or delete some EXIF and properties of the video file
+ Trim unwanted parts of the video
+ Crop the video into any size
+ Splice videos and images with 100+ transition animation effects
+ Mosaic a part of the video statically or dynamically: select the shape and type, adjust the blur intensity and speed of moving, drag the handler and move to blur the selected part of the video; can invert the blurred area
+ Add some text into the video with rich text effects
+ Adjust the color and effect of the video with dozens of filters
+ Take a picture from the video
+ Tuner by which to adjust the pitch and volume of the sound within the video, distort the sound, and add reverb to the sound make the sound have some special effects
+ Dub for the video and support to adjust the volume
+ Add special audios into the video with over 200 sound effects
+ Adjust the playback speed of the video
+ Replay a selected segment of the video and flexibly set count of loop and the the speed of playing
+ Let the video playback in reverse order
+ Zoom in or out the video
+ Rotate or flip the video and support 3D rotation at any angle
+ Compress the video by resolution, bit rate and frame rate
+ Convert the video into GIF
+ Create a picture-in-picture video
+ Add borders to video with rich border material
+ Add static or dynamic stickers to videos and can adjust the size, position, duration, speed, color and so on; can flip it; can choose an image as a static sticker or GIF as a dynamic sticker
+ Support collage of videos with rich background textures
+ Paint on the video: select color and width of brush, draw, undo, redo, erase
+ BlingBling for the video and make them full of brilliance: automatically detect highlights, add spot and star streaks and flexibly adjust their quantity, rotating speed and strength
+ Add particle effects for the videos: over 100 particle effects templates and rich particle texture images, 
flexible adjustment of various parameters of particle emission. Use your imagination to add surprises to your videos.
+ Add magnifier for video: flexibility to select the area to be enlarged and adjust the magnification and display position of the magnifier
+ Distort video: provide a variety of distortion types
and flexibly adjust twist radius, force and center position
+ Reflect video: provide a variety of reflection filters and flexibly adjust the boundary and center position of reflection
+ Blend videos: provide 20+ classic blend modes: darken, multiply, color burn, linear burn, lighten, color dodge, linear dodge, overlay, soft light, hard light, average, difference, exclusion and so on; flexibly adjust the opacity, size and position of the foreground; exchange the foreground and the background; make the blended area into a variety of shapes
+ Erase video: you can flexibly select the erased area (eg. the watermark) by drawing directly on the video to erase the content on the fixed area, and the effect is better for the erased area with simple background color
+ Chromakey video: chromakey by which a block of a particular color (often blue or green) in a video image can be replaced by another color
...

=== QUICK RESPONSE ===  
+ Real-time preview
+ Quickly generated
+ Support 1080P HD output
	
=== SAVE AND SHARE ===   	
+ May save videos to your camera roll
+ Easily share videos with friends

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com. Thanks for using Videdit.

tr.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

tr.description:

FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

BASIC FEATURES

• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

tr.description:
A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

Features
- Elegant minimalist design
- Daily Summary
- Beautiful crafted design themes
- Quotes to inspire and motivate you
- Custom timer duration for your tasks


Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

tr.description:
Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. 

Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging.

The Demon King's Castle in Ruins
The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before.
What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. 
They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'.

Dark Mirror Mode
Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode!

FEATURES
-You’re the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon.  
-Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies.
-What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer.
-Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state.
-From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover… Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game?

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFi controllers
- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

tr.releaseNotes: Thank you for playing Evoland 2! We're keeping the game up to date and fixing issues.
tr.description:
What were your childhood games like?

Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references.

From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you’ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored.

“Evoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder” is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology.

Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we’re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices.  

« It’s a mashup on a grand scale — and a successful one — bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. » - 9/10 GamesBeat

“Evoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.”
4/5 – Hardcoregamer

Compatible with MFI controllers. 

If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

tr.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.
